properties.name: wb-cloud.rocketmq.enabled
properties.description: enable or disable rocketmq auto configure.

properties.name: wb-cloud.rocketmq.producer.sendMessageTimeout
properties.description: rocket mq producer send message timeout.

properties.name: wb-cloud.rocketmq.producer.compressMessageBodyThreshold
properties.description: rocket mq producer compress message body threshold.

properties.name: wb-cloud.rocketmq.producer.retryTimesWhenSendFailed
properties.description: rocket mq producer retry times when send failed.

properties.name: wb-cloud.rocketmq.producer.retryTimesWhenSendAsyncFailed
properties.description: rocket mq producer retry times when send async failed.

properties.name: wb-cloud.rocketmq.producer.retryNextServer
properties.description: rocket mq producer retry next server.

properties.name: wb-cloud.rocketmq.producer.maxMessageSize
properties.description: rocket mq producer max message size.

properties.name: wb-cloud.rocketmq.producer.enableMsgTrace
properties.description: rocket mq producer enable msg trace.

properties.name: wb-cloud.rocketmq.producer.customizedTraceTopic
properties.description: rocket mq producer customized trace topic.
